name: Elevens!!
description: A digital card game with 80 cards divided up into 4 colors, numbered from 1-20. The goal of the game is to get rid of all your cards by placing them with like-colored cards in descending or ascending order from the number 11. Other cards can be placed after the 11 card of a color is played. The order the players enter the lobby decides their turn order. Each player has to play a card when it’s their turn if they have a playable card. Otherwise they draw from the deck until they find a playable card. A player can draw 3 times to find a playable card after the 3rd card if the player has no playable cards they must end their turn. Lastly, when a player has zero cards in their hand they must end their turn to win and end the game.
